post.body: I finished watching and HOLY CRAP!...you look like my brother! HAHAHAHAA!!!!! WIN! Cool film short. Congrats to all.
I reread my second to last tweet and I meant "I'm NOT doctory enough to diagnose myself." Wow, being stupid can be dangerous. :(
Oh yeah! I forgot I'm 7 hours ahead of you. Good luck with le shopping. I'm downloading both "Deus Ex Machina" but it's slow. :D
I did look in the mirror and saw swollen red and white stuff but I'm doctory enough to diagnose things. How's shopping going? :)
Procrastinator... Isn't there a legend about cats stealing your sould while you sleep. You stil souled, Brandon?
What's with all the question marks?
I don't know, man!! I think it's my throat causing all of this mess...or tonsils. Gasp! Maybe I need to have them removed! Dunno
's tribute to Kanye. http://tinyurl.com/7256cw
It's for a good cause. God-willing, I'm going to be doing some traveling pretty soon and I need to have those things done! ^_^
While playing a game in MAME, click "Tab" > Input (general) > User Interface > press "Enter" to configure new keys.
I ate chocolate chips too! It's probably why I can't sleep...all the sugar. It's 10 a.m. and I must sleep NOW!! Eyelids, CLOSE!!
I can't cos I haven't slept yet and it's 9:43am. I'm having some serious insomnia. I'm trying to sleep but I keep checking mail.
The doctor came, examined me and told me I had early tonsilitis. Will look it up on the net. I'm in my Mom's room while my room aerates.
Gonna post video of sand storm tomorrow. My hands and feet are so cold with gloves and socks on. Doctor coming to check up on me tomorrow.
New blog post about the sandstorm here right now: http://tinyurl.com/9au6kl
Slept so horribly last night. My feet were cold and my throat swelled up not letting me breathe. I got errands in the city to do all day. :(
Found a way to cheat non-U.S. blocking websites! Now, I'm listening to XL1067. I was also watching Fox.com. Stupid country censoring. DIE!!!
Woke up feeling like I'm 40 and fabulous... I'm 26 years old so that's not a good thing. My joints hurt, I'm tired and my throat has a cut.
It's 12:34 a.m. and I gotta wake up early tomorrow for some blood-work and some picture-taking. I'm also feeling the flu coming back. Crap.
I can't access YouTUbe for some reason. I blame the submarine cables in the Mediterranean being cut fiasco. Saw Forbidden Kingdom with fam.
